reviews.review: Very fun to play with friends
This game is fun and I like the characters, their designs are very unique and intriguing. Other than that I get tbagged a lot and it makes me angry so I complain about it but never stop playing
Terribly balanced game that crushes my soul every time I play it, regardless I keep coming back for some reason

Despite what any forum will tell you, this game is very balanced in the killer/survivor dynamic. Survivors are favored more, but killer wins are more rewarding. All the killers are awesome and with enough practice you can dominate with any of them. The only thing I dislike about this game is that 9/10 maps are spooky forest.

Recommended for anyone who loves horror games or a fun game to play with friends. There is also no better game to play around Halloween time.

in an abusive relationship with this game, pls send help. I fucking hate them, but eventually, I come crawling back to the familiar; a long decayed and rotten embrace of continuous suffering and endless disappointment. I embrace them with a twisted and crazed smile, rehearsing my hollow melodious phrase, "maybe it'll be better this time, right?". No, I am wrong again. It seems that the realm of the entity transcends reality at times. There's a fog that draws you in. It's evil, riddled with darkness, but in spite of that you continue to walk towards it, almost enthralled with it, like a cat on a lazer pointer. like the realm of the entity, endless trials, over and over again, repeating, again and again, each one a dance with death and torment. I step into the fog and dark tendrils pull me under as I feel my soul drowning once again.

Not worth your time or money. If you are not running the sweatest metaperks you will lose on either side of the game. Even if both sides gimp themselves for no reason in an attempt to have fun RNG will fuck you over with skill checks popping the same time you let go of a gen, bugs and strange hit reg giving absurd hits or taking away clear hits at vaults and windows, and your teammates sometimes just deciding to grief you even to no benefit to themselves if you have the audacity to not have three other friends to subject this painful experience to.
ttv in the name = they are bad at the game, golden rule.

Le-Le-Le-Legoshi's review above is as accurate as one could describe the phenomenon that is DBD. It is so accurate that I myself along with many others have given up and quit this attention-seeking grade-school-delinquent simulator. Seriously guys and gals, there are so many other productive, fulfilling, and meaningful things you could be doing with your precious time on this planet, instead of being made feel like you're in prison having to put up with a bunch of pathetic excuses of human beings, for just trying to enjoy a video game for an hour or two on your hard-earned off day(s). This game in my opinion honestly just isn't worth the frustration. Not to mention that the game is in no way, shape or form is even close to being beginner friendly. I'm not exaggerating an ounce when i say that you need at least around 1,500 to 2,500 hours in this game just to actually be able to have access to most of the perks that players can pick in the loadout menu. In my opinion, that is just way too much grind for anybody who just wants to play for fun (casually). Speaking of playing casually, that isn't an option in this game. Like Le-Le-Le-Legoshi's comment above me stated, once you get past the lowest rank category for either killer or survivor (that being ash rank), all of a sudden everybody turns into professional tournament players and there is no room for said fun. They are all about efficiency and steamrolling you while being as degenerative as they can, just to show off and try to make you feel out of place, and so I am going to have to give this game a thumbs down, which sucks because this game could be so much more, well... fun. I think that it once had potential, but now it's long gone. If I were you guys i would try just about any other game that you had in mind.
best game. has loads of hours on my xbox. 10/10

Un juego muy divertido sobre todo cuando llegas de trabajar y para desconectar un poco disfrutas de un buen tuneleo y un buen campeo, el matchmaking funciona perfectamente siempre juegas contra rusos tryhards de 3000h como superviviente y tus compa√±eros de 300h usan metaperks como evasi√≥n urbana, autocuraci√≥n, sprint y deja vu para saber a que generador no acercarse a reparar mientras disfrutan de un agradable paseo por el mapa. Usualmente disfrutas de tu primera chase antes de morir en tu primer cuelgue ya que tus compa√±eros est√°n muy ocupados limpiando las taquillas por dentro...Recomiendo tomarte un trankimazin por cada partida en la que mueras en tu primer cuelgue o por cada partida en la que el asesino sea un ruso tryhard de 3000h y que despues de que te tuneleen y campeen te digan ez en el chat final.
En resumidas cuentas si quieres disfrutar de este juego a largo plazo te vas a tener que medicar.

Se ha convertido en algo injugable como killer, totalmente impossible de jugar, siempre vas a encontrar premades de 4 que te van a perseguir en vez de ser el killer quien los persiga, cuentan con decisive strike, tiempo prestado, irrompible, chungo e infinidad de habilidades que va a convertir tu experiencia como killer en simplemente absurda, antes de que consigas colgar a alguien habr√°n acabado 4 de los 5 generadores as√≠ que la partida no habr√° durado mas de 10 minutos. Simplemente el peor juego 1 vs 4 isometrico que existe, totalmente desbalanceado para los survivors desde que sali√≥. Simplemente el killer consigue ganar si campeas, tunneleas y los survivors la l√≠an muchisimo en la partida
Esta piola a la larga le pierdes el miedo al killer y empiezas a trollearlo, despu√©s se vuelve repetido y se vuelve un juego casual, 50/50

This use to be my favourite game to play and by no mean is it a horrible game although i do think it is not great, I've spent over 1000 hours in this game and have played both sides quite a lot, but with every update they give this game it makes me want to remove this game entirely from my library they take everything that's fun out of the game and claim they want it to be easier for players to "grind" meanwhile they are nerfing all bloodpoint perks and forcing you to prestige your characters to get your perks to a better tier, but in reality what they are doing is forcing me to lose all my 2016 addons that i have been holding on to for a long time, the game is survivor sided for the most part making it feel like sometimes no matter what you do you can't win, then the amount of cheaters is flat out disgusting, i have entirely stopped playing killer because every 4 or so games you run into a cheater who will try to hold you hostage in the game forcing you to dc and take a penalty, looking at some positives though this game does have a lot of unique killers you can play keeping it nice and fresh but when playing survivor you tend to play against the same 5 killers when there is over 20 incredibly fun to play with friends, I'm sure new players can like this game easily just from someone who has been playing for a long time seeing the changes they have made kind of hurts 5/10
Fantastic game! Being able to play classic horror icons is a dream come true!

I'm a survivor main because I love the thrill of trying to complete the generators, watching my back, help teammates out, makes it pretty exciting. I just started on PC from console and I record all my game play, let me tell you people I have so many fn clips where you will be working on a generator and the killer literally walks in front of you and stands there. You are now unable to move for the entire game and then right as the countdown happens the killer wrecks you and there is absolutely N O T H I N G you can do about it. The worst part is, if you're getting trolled by some toxic 12 year old and you decide to leave the match you get a time penalty for quitting the game early. And don't get me started on if this happens 2 or 3 times in a row you'll be waiting 30+ fn minutes just to play a game that you paid $20+ for. Absolute dog water. Other than that I love the game, just wish that garbage would change.

Tralasciando il fatto che sto gioco √® una miniera d'oro per i cheater, iniziamo dal gioco in se: 4 sopravvissuti devono riparare il pi√π velocemente possibile alcuni generatori, e nel frattempo un killer li insegue e li cerca di uccidere. Fin qua tutto bene, sembra un gioco horror fatto molto bene, peccato che NON sia un gioco horror ma un competitivo! Dico che non √® un gioco horror per il semplice fatto che un gioco horror per spaventarmi seriamente dovrebbe almeno avere la prima persona per chi scappa e invece? E invece √® il killer a giocare in prima persona mentre il sopravvissuto in terza, tanto che qualche volta mi sono preso un colpo giocando da killer dei survivor che saltavano le staccionate senza aspettarmelo. Andatevi a cercare su youtube dbd moddato con la prima persona, da cagarsi addosso. Parliamo del competitivo: mi potete gentilmente spiegare come possa un gioco 4 vs 1 definirsi gioco COMPETITIVO? E' palese che ci sia un netto sbilanciamento a favore di un team di 4 persone e allora gli intelligentissimi sviluppatori cos'hanno pensato bene di fare? rendere overpowered i killer! Quindi che succede: se giochi survivor da solo hai bassissime possibilit√† di vincere, se giochi killer da solo invece sono alte. Ma cosa succede invece se 4 amici decidono di formare un team di 4 persone che comunicano tra loro? L'esatto completo OPPOSTO! Sar√† l'esperienza pi√π frustrante della tua vita: Survivor che si instacurano, generatori che vengono riparati in mezzo minuto, survivor che si metteranno in 4 pur di non farti appendere il compagno... insomma 99% delle volte con 4 premade contro perdi in maniera veramente frustrante! Ma allora mi chiedo: ma possibile che non vi viene in mente oltre a far uscire nuovi personaggi di mettere una modalit√† 2 vs 6? Magari con mappe pi√π grandi? Invogliereste molta pi√π gente a giocarci considerando che (almeno secondo me) la cosa divertente di sto gioco √® fare il killer. Ma poi parliamo dei personaggi: personaggi bellissimi, ognuno con una propria specialit√† e competenza... peccato valga solo per i killer dato che i survivor hanno solo i perk che puoi prendere dagli altri survivor. Perch√® non date una qualche caratterizzazione/specialit√† a ciascun survivor come con i killer? E poi ultima cosa: variate sto gioco, create qualcosa di innovativo, il progetto √® interessantissimo, peccato che da 4 anni a questa parte non si sia evoluto per NIENTE! Guardate altri giochi che hanno fatto successo come sono cresciuti, voi siete conosciuti solo per il meme di Zeb89 che gioca solo a questo, svegliatevi un attimo e cominciate ad investirci seriamente su sto gioco che le potenzialit√† le ha. A giudicare da come si √® sviluppato negli ultimi anni sono dell'idea che forse 4/5 euro li pu√≤ valere, di pi√π assolutamente no dato che sono gli sviluppatori i primi a non crederci
